items.question: What is diginu?
items.answer: diginu is an online food delivery app that not only has much cheaper rates but also offers you the opportunity to earn recurring commissions.
followups: How do I earn with diginu? (earn)

items.question: How do I earn with diginu?
aliases: how can i earn with diginu?
items.answer: You can earn a few ways with diginu. You can earn from our delivery side (customers and merchants), our rewards programme (diginuCashBack) and our electric bikes (diginuEgo).
followups: What is diginuPSP? (psp-001)
How do I earn with diginuPSP? (psp-002)
What are the 2 ways to earn in diginuPSP? (psp-007)

items.question: What is diginuCashBack?
items.answer: diginuCashBack is our rewards programme, where you can save every day as well as create an income every time the people that you referred pay their membership.
followups: How do I cancel my diginuCashBack debit order? (cancel-cashback-debit)
What is diginu? (what-is-diginu)

items.question: Can someone be moved if they signed up wrong?
aliases: what if they register under wrong person
items.answer: If someone registered under another person they cannot be moved (we have a 'registered for life' policy). If they accidentally registered under the company, you can email enrollerchange@diginu.com to request a move, but it must be within 7 days of that person registering.
followups: How do I request an enroller change on diginu? (enroller-change-policy)
What does “linked for life” mean on diginu? (psp-004)

items.question: How do I cancel my diginuCashBack debit order?
aliases: Remove My Banking Details From Diginucashback
how do i cancel cashback debit order
how do i remove my bank details from diginu
how do i stop diginucashback payment
items.answer: To cancel your diginuCashBack debit order and remove your banking details, you must email cashback@diginu.com . This cannot be done in your profile or app settings — all cancellations are processed by our support team via email. Be sure to include your full name, ID number, and registered phone number in your email so they can locate your account.
followups: Where is diginu’s Privacy Policy? (privacy-policy-link)
Where can I find diginu’s Privacy Policy and Terms? (policies-and-terms-overview)

items.question: What is diginuEgo?
aliases: tell me about the diginuEgo bike
items.answer: diginuEgo is an AI-powered electric motorbike designed for modern mobility in Africa. It pairs smart security and live tracking with practical daily performance, making it ideal for commuting, delivery work, and fleet use. Electric, mid-drive motor Live tracking dashboard Remote power-off (anti-theft) Swappable lithium-ion batteries Fleet management ready It’s built for reliability, affordability and real-world convenience.
followups: What are the key features of diginuEgo? (ego-features)
What are the technical specifications of diginuEgo? (ego-specs)
How much does the diginuEgo cost? (ego-price)
Does the diginuEgo have anti-theft and tracking? (ego-security)
Where can I see diginuEgo videos and demos? (ego-videos)
Where can I find more information about diginuEgo? (ego-001)

items.question: What are the key features of diginuEgo?
aliases: What Makes The Ego Bike Special
items.answer: AI & Telematics: live tracking dashboard for visibility and control Remote Power-Off: disable the bike remotely if stolen Swappable Batteries: keep riding by swapping packs (no long downtime) Strong Braking: front & rear disc brakes (240mm) Comfort & Handling: upside-down front fork + rear monoshock Built for Work: fleet management functionality Everyday Practicality: suitable for commuting, school or work
followups: What are the technical specifications of diginuEgo? (ego-specs)
How much does the diginuEgo cost? (ego-price)
Does the diginuEgo have anti-theft and tracking? (ego-security)
Where can I see diginuEgo videos and demos? (ego-videos)

items.question: What are the technical specifications of diginuEgo?
aliases: what are the specs of the ego bike
items.answer: Brakes: front & rear disc brakes (240mm) Front Suspension: upside-down (inverted) telescopic fork Rear Suspension: monoshock Wheelbase: 1350 mm Seat Height: 815 mm (rider) Carrying Capacity: up to 150 kg Motor: mid-drive, 3000 W Battery: lithium-ion, swappable Pack Voltage: 65–72 V Energy: ~4.3 kWh
followups: What are the key features of diginuEgo? (ego-features)
How much does the diginuEgo cost? (ego-price)

items.question: What is the battery, range and charging time for diginuEgo?
aliases: How Long To Charge Ego Bike
What is the battery range and charging time for diginuEgo
items.answer: Battery: lithium-ion, swappable packs Charging: ~80% in Range (Eco): ~105–120 km* Range (Normal): ~75–90 km* Range (Sport): ~65–70 km* *Actual range varies with load, terrain and riding style.
followups: What are the technical specifications of diginuEgo? (ego-specs)
What are the key features of diginuEgo? (ego-features)

items.question: How much does the diginuEgo cost?
aliases: what is the price of the ego bike
items.answer: The diginuEgo bike is priced at R89,900 (incl. VAT) . Licensing and admin fees are excluded. Interested in ordering or a quote? Contact us and we’ll assist.
followups: What are the key features of diginuEgo? (ego-features)
Where can I find more information about diginuEgo? (ego-001)

items.question: Does the diginuEgo have anti-theft and tracking?
aliases: Can Ego Be Disabled If Stolen
Does the diginuEgo have antitheft and tracking
items.answer: Remote power-off: disable the bike over the internet if stolen Live tracking dashboard: monitor location and status in real-time Fleet visibility: centralised oversight for multiple bikes These features are part of diginu’s focus on secure, reliable mobility.
followups: What are the key features of diginuEgo? (ego-features)
Where can I see diginuEgo videos and demos? (ego-videos)

items.question: Is the diginuEgo good for delivery riders and commuting?
aliases: Ego Bike For School Or Work
Is The Ego Practical For Commuting
items.answer: Yes. diginuEgo is designed for daily use with low running costs and minimal downtime thanks to swappable batteries . The suspension, braking and mid-drive configuration support predictable handling in urban traffic. For delivery teams, live tracking and remote control improve safety and operational oversight.
followups: What are the key features of diginuEgo? (ego-features)
Does the diginuEgo have anti-theft and tracking? (ego-security)

items.question: Does the diginuEgo support fleet management?
aliases: does ego integrate with fleet tools
items.answer: Yes. The platform includes fleet management functionality with a live dashboard for location, usage and control. This helps teams optimise deployment, monitor security, and reduce downtime.
followups: What are the key features of diginuEgo? (ego-features)
Where can I find more information about diginuEgo? (ego-001)

items.question: Are there plans for battery swapping or charging stations?
aliases: When Will Ego Have Battery Swap Stations
items.answer: Yes. From 2026 , diginu plans to roll out battery swapping and charging stations across the country, with solar and wind generation at many sites. This supports faster turnarounds and lower operating costs for riders and fleets.
followups: What are the key features of diginuEgo? (ego-features)
What is the battery, range and charging time for diginuEgo? (ego-battery-range-charging)

items.question: How do I withdraw cash from my diginuPay wallet?
aliases: how to cash out from diginuPay
where can i withdraw diginupay money
items.answer: You can withdraw cash from your diginuPay wallet using a cashout voucher sent to your phone. Here’s how it works: Open your diginuPay app and request a cash withdrawal You will receive an SMS with a Nedbank MobiMoney voucher code Go to any supported store or ATM and use the voucher to withdraw cash Where you can withdraw: Nedbank ATMs Checkers, Shoprite, Pick n Pay, OK, Usave, Boxer & House and Home Kazang partner stores nationwide diginuPay is integrated with Nedbank MobiMoney , giving you thousands of withdrawal locations across South Africa for easy access.
followups: What are the fees for withdrawing cash from diginuPay? (diginupay-withdrawal-fees)
What are the daily withdrawal limits on diginuPay? (diginupay-daily-limits)
I didn’t receive my voucher SMS — what should I do? (diginupay-voucher-sms-not-received)

items.question: Thank you
items.answer: You're most welcome! 😊

items.question: What are the fees for withdrawing cash from diginuPay?
aliases: How Much Does It Cost To Withdraw
items.answer: Withdrawal fees depend on the withdrawal method and are shown before you confirm the cashout in the app. You’ll always see the fee and total amount you will receive. Generate a Nedbank MobiMoney voucher in your diginuPay app Fees are clearly displayed at checkout Some partner locations may show fees on the till/ATM screen Tip: If something looks incorrect, cancel and try again or contact support. Need help? wecare@diginu.com
followups: How do I withdraw cash from my diginuPay wallet? (diginupay-cash-withdrawal)
What are the daily withdrawal limits on diginuPay? (diginupay-daily-limits)

items.question: What are the daily withdrawal limits on diginuPay?
aliases: How Much Can I Withdraw Per Day
items.answer: Withdrawal and transaction limits help protect your account and may vary based on your verification (KYC) status. Limits are shown at the point of withdrawal Higher limits may require ID verification Multiple withdrawals per day are allowed within your limit Security note: diginuPay may request extra verification to keep your funds safe. Questions? wecare@diginu.com
followups: What are the fees for withdrawing cash from diginuPay? (diginupay-withdrawal-fees)
How do I withdraw cash from my diginuPay wallet? (diginupay-cash-withdrawal)

items.question: Can I transfer money wallet-to-wallet on diginuPay?
aliases: Can I transfer money wallettowallet on diginuPay
send money to another diginupay user
items.answer: Yes, you can make instant wallet-to-wallet transfers to any diginuPay user. Open the app → Transfer → select/browse recipient Confirm amount and reference Recipient is notified instantly Security note: Only send to people you trust and double-check the recipient details before confirming.
followups: How do I transfer money from diginuPay to my bank account? (diginupay-transfer-to-bank)
How do I receive money in my diginuPay wallet? (diginupay-receive-money)

items.question: How do I transfer money from diginuPay to my bank account?
items.answer: You can transfer to a South African bank account from within the app. Add or select your bank beneficiary Enter amount and confirm Processing times vary by bank and method Security note: For your protection, diginuPay may verify your identity before enabling bank transfers. Need assistance? wecare@diginu.com
followups: How do I update my bank details in diginuPay? (diginupay-update-bank-details)
Which banks and cards are supported by diginuPay? (diginupay-supported-banks)

items.question: How do I receive money in my diginuPay wallet?
aliases: How Can Someone Send Me Money
items.answer: There are a few ways to receive money: Another user sends you a wallet-to-wallet transfer You receive funds from a merchant payout or commission You deposit using any available top-up method in the app You’ll get a notification when funds land.
followups: Can I transfer money wallet-to-wallet on diginuPay? (diginupay-wallet-to-wallet)
How do I deposit money into my diginuPay wallet? (diginupay-deposit-into-wallet)

items.question: Which banks and cards are supported by diginuPay?
aliases: Can I Use Nedbank Capitec Fnb
Does My Bank Work With Diginupay
items.answer: diginuPay works with major South African banks for transfers and voucher cashouts via Nedbank MobiMoney . Card support and methods may vary by feature. Withdrawals: Nedbank ATMs and partner retailers via voucher Transfers: to SA bank accounts (processing times may vary) Cards/Instant EFT: availability shown in app during checkout Check your app for the latest supported options.
followups: How do I transfer money from diginuPay to my bank account? (diginupay-transfer-to-bank)
How do I withdraw cash from my diginuPay wallet? (diginupay-cash-withdrawal)

items.question: I didn’t receive my voucher SMS — what should I do?
aliases: I didnt receive my voucher SMS what should I do
items.answer: If your Nedbank MobiMoney voucher SMS hasn’t arrived: Confirm your phone has signal and isn’t in Do Not Disturb Check your number in Profile is correct Wait a few minutes and try resend if available If still missing, cancel and generate a new voucher Note: Some networks can delay SMS delivery. If it persists, contact us with your attempted time and amount. Support: wecare@diginu.com
followups: How do I withdraw cash from my diginuPay wallet? (diginupay-cash-withdrawal)
My cash withdrawal failed — how do I fix it? (diginupay-cash-withdrawal-failed)

items.question: My voucher expired — can I still withdraw?
aliases: My voucher expired can I still withdraw
items.answer: Expired vouchers can’t be redeemed. Simply generate a new voucher in the app and use it at an eligible ATM or retailer. Check the validity window when you create the voucher Only share codes with trusted cashiers If you’re unsure whether a voucher was used, contact support and we’ll help trace it.
followups: How do I withdraw cash from my diginuPay wallet? (diginupay-cash-withdrawal)
What are the daily withdrawal limits on diginuPay? (diginupay-daily-limits)

items.question: My cash withdrawal failed — how do I fix it?
aliases: My cash withdrawal failed how do I fix it
items.answer: Try these steps: Confirm the voucher code matches your SMS Use a listed Nedbank ATM or supported retailer Check you’re selecting Nedbank MobiMoney at the till/ATM Ensure you’re within the voucher’s validity and your daily limit If it still fails, note the time, store/ATM, and error message, then contact us. Support: wecare@diginu.com
followups: I didn’t receive my voucher SMS — what should I do? (diginupay-voucher-sms-not-received)
What are the fees for withdrawing cash from diginuPay? (diginupay-withdrawal-fees)

items.question: How do I update my bank details in diginuPay?
items.answer: You can update your payout/bank details from your profile or payments section in the app. Open Profile → Bank details Edit account name/number/branch Save and verify if prompted Security note: For your protection, we may request ID verification when changing bank details.
followups: How do I add or link a bank account to diginuPay? (diginupay-link-bank-account)
How do I transfer money from diginuPay to my bank account? (diginupay-transfer-to-bank)

items.question: How do I add or link a bank account to diginuPay?
items.answer: To link a bank account for payouts: Go to Profile → Bank details Enter your bank, account number and branch info Save and complete any verification steps Once linked, you can transfer from your wallet to your bank.
followups: How do I transfer money from diginuPay to my bank account? (diginupay-transfer-to-bank)
How do I update my bank details in diginuPay? (diginupay-update-bank-details)

items.question: How do I deposit money into my diginuPay wallet?
items.answer: Open your app and choose a top-up option available to you. Methods may include card, EFT, or other providers displayed in-app. Choose your method and amount Follow the prompts to complete payment We’ll notify you when funds arrive Note: Processing times vary by method.
followups: How do I receive money in my diginuPay wallet? (diginupay-receive-money)
Why is my payment pending in diginuPay? (diginupay-pending-payments)

items.question: Why is my payment pending in diginuPay?
aliases: Why Is My Transaction Still Pending
items.answer: Pending means your payment is still being processed by the bank or provider. This is normal for EFT and some card methods. Most pendings resolve automatically Times vary by bank/weekend/public holidays If it exceeds the usual window, contact support with your reference
followups: How do I deposit money into my diginuPay wallet? (diginupay-deposit-into-wallet)
How do reversals and refunds work on diginuPay? (diginupay-reversals-refunds)

items.question: How do reversals and refunds work on diginuPay?
items.answer: Refunds and reversals depend on the original payment method and provider rules. In-app transfers are usually final Card/EFT payments may require a provider dispute We’ll help investigate if funds didn’t arrive or were duplicated Start by sharing the date, amount and reference with support. Contact: wecare@diginu.com
followups: Why is my payment pending in diginuPay? (diginupay-pending-payments)
How do I transfer money from diginuPay to my bank account? (diginupay-transfer-to-bank)

items.question: Why is my diginuPay account locked or flagged?
items.answer: Accounts can be temporarily restricted for security or compliance reasons (e.g., unusual activity, incorrect details, or pending KYC checks). Check your email/app notifications for instructions Complete any requested ID verification Contact support if you need help resolving it These checks help keep your money safe and prevent fraud.
followups: How do I contact diginu support? (account-email-verify)
Which banks and cards are supported by diginuPay? (diginupay-supported-banks)

items.question: Where are the Customer Terms and Conditions?

items.question: What is the difference between a merchant and a merchant marketer?
items.answer: A merchant is a business (e.g., restaurant, grocery store, liquor store) that sells on the diginu app. A merchant marketer is an accredited diginu partner who onboards merchants to the platform and earns ongoing commission from customer orders placed at the live merchants in their portfolio.
followups: What is a merchant on diginu? (mm-002)
What is a merchant marketer on diginu? (mm-003)

items.question: What is a merchant on diginu?
items.answer: A merchant is a business that lists products or services on the diginu marketplace, receives orders from customers, and fulfills those orders via pickup or delivery. Examples include restaurants, grocery stores, liquor stores, bakeries, and specialty retailers.
followups: How do I become a merchant on diginu? (mm-016)
aliases: what stores are considered a merchant

items.question: What is a merchant marketer on diginu?
items.answer: A merchant marketer is an individual who has completed diginu’s accreditation course and is authorized to onboard merchants to the platform. They build a portfolio of merchants and earn commission from every order placed by customers at those live merchants.
followups: How do I become a merchant marketer? (mm-017)
Do merchant marketers earn commission? (mm-004)

items.question: How do merchant marketers earn commission?
items.answer: Merchant marketers earn commission on every order placed through the diginu app across all live merchants in their personal portfolio. Earnings grow as your portfolio expands and your merchants succeed.
followups: How much commission can I earn? (mm-018)
When and how are commissions paid? (mm-019)

items.question: What is a merchant portfolio?
items.answer: Your merchant portfolio is the list of merchants you personally onboarded to diginu. Commissions are calculated from orders generated by all live merchants in this portfolio.

items.question: Who can become a merchant marketer?
items.answer: Anyone who completes the diginu Merchant Marketer Accreditation Course and agrees to our partner guidelines can become a merchant marketer. A passion for business development and local commerce helps.
followups: Do I need sales experience? (mm-012)

items.question: Is there a cost to become a merchant marketer?
items.answer: No, all training, certification and the opportunity to earn is completely free!
followups: What does the accreditation include? (mm-008)

items.question: How long does accreditation take?
items.answer: Most candidates complete the diginu accreditation course quickly. The timeline depends on your pace—plan for focused learning, a short assessment, and onboarding to our tools.

items.question: Is the merchant marketer role full-time or part-time?
items.answer: It’s flexible. Many start part-time and scale up as their merchant portfolio grows. Your income can expand with the number and performance of your live merchants.
aliases: Is the merchant marketer role fulltime or parttime

items.question: Do merchant marketers get support and tools?
items.answer: Yes. Accredited marketers receive onboarding resources, training and ongoing support to help grow and support their merchant portfolio.

items.question: Can merchant marketers onboard merchants in any location?
items.answer: You should focus on regions where Diginu is active or launching. We’ll guide you on supported areas and expansion plans so your efforts translate into live, earning merchants.

items.question: Do merchant marketers need sales experience?
items.answer: Sales experience helps but isn’t required. We provide a practical framework: how to find prospects, present diginu, handle objections, and get merchants live quickly.
followups: Do you offer sales training? (training-001)

items.question: What is the benefit of becoming a merchant marketer?
items.answer: You create value for local businesses, help them grow via the diginu app, and earn ongoing commissions from customer orders. It’s a scalable, impact-driven opportunity.
aliases: benefit of being a merchant marketer
advantages of being a merchant marketer

items.question: Can merchant marketers build teams?
items.answer: Your primary focus is onboarding your own merchants. Where applicable, we may pilot programs that recognize collaboration. We’ll share details if a team pathway is available in your region.

items.question: What products do merchants sell on Diginu?
items.answer: Common categories include prepared food, groceries, liquor, and specialty goods. Availability varies by merchant and region, and merchants manage their own menus and inventory.

items.question: How do I become a merchant on Diginu?
items.answer: Share your business details, catalog, and fulfillment preferences, then complete onboarding so we can activate your store on the app. A merchant marketer can guide you end-to-end.

items.question: How do I become a merchant marketer?
items.answer: Apply for the diginu Merchant Marketer Accreditation, complete the course and assessment, accept our partner terms, and you’ll receive access to onboarding tools and your performance dashboard.

items.question: How much commission can I earn as a merchant marketer?
items.answer: Your earnings depend on the number of live merchants in your portfolio and their order volumes.
followups: When and how are commissions paid? (mm-019)

items.question: When and how are commissions paid?
items.answer: Commissions are paid every Friday at 15:15 into your diginuPay wallet
followups: How much commission can I earn as a merchant marketer? (mm-018)
Which banks and cards are supported by diginuPay? (diginupay-supported-banks)

items.question: Is there a contract or NDA for merchant marketers?
items.answer: Accredited marketers accept diginu’s partner terms, which cover brand use, data handling, and compliance. Additional agreements may apply depending on program.

items.question: What support do merchants receive after going live?
items.answer: Merchants get access to menu management and support resources. Merchant marketers must help with launch readiness, menu updates, and best practices to drive orders.

items.question: What is diginu’s delivery radius?
items.answer: diginu offers delivery within a 6km radius of the store the customer orders from. The distance is always calculated from the physical location of the store, not from the customer’s address or city.

items.question: How do I request an enroller change on diginu?
items.answer: diginu allows enroller changes within 7 days of joining. Email enrollerchange@diginu.com and include the original welcome email the user received when they joined. Before sending, verify that the enrollment date on the welcome email is within the last 7 days. If someone joined diginu directly on the website (and not via your referral link), you can request that they be moved under you by following the same process.
followups: Can someone be moved if they signed up wrong? (can-someone-be-moved)
What does “linked for life” mean on diginu? (psp-004)
aliases: joined under the company by mistake
joined on the website not my link

items.question: Who is Jessie Bester?
items.answer: Jessie Bester is the CEO and Founder of diginu. He created diginuPSP, a people-focused business model designed to uplift others by sharing profits with the people who help grow the platform. Jessie believes in removing barriers to opportunity and building a business that rewards ordinary people for their contribution.
followups: What is the diginuPSP business model? (psp-business-model)
What is diginuPSP? (psp-001)

items.question: What is the diginuPSP business model?
items.answer: diginuPSP is a people-driven business model created by diginu CEO Jessie Bester to uplift others through shared success. Instead of spending millions on traditional advertising, diginu avoids upfront marketing costs and shares a portion of its profit with the people who help grow the platform by enrolling customers. This means marketing money is only paid **after a sale happens**, not before. As a result, customers get **more affordable products**, and everyday people have the opportunity to **earn income** through the diginuPSP system.
followups: What is diginuPSP? (psp-001)
How do I earn with diginuPSP? (psp-002)
How does the 5-generation PSP earning system work? (psp-010)

items.question: What is diginuPSP?
items.answer:
diginuPSP (Profit Share Program) is diginu’s people-first model that rewards the individuals who help grow the platform. Instead of paying for expensive, upfront advertising, diginu shares a portion of profit with the people who enroll new customers. Marketing spend happens after a sale, not before, which helps keep products more affordable for customers.

See also: How do I earn with diginuPSP? · How does the referral link work?
followups: How do I earn with diginuPSP? (psp-002)
How does the referral link work? (psp-003)

items.question: How do I earn with diginuPSP?
items.answer:
You earn by sharing your unique diginu referral link with friends, family, or customers. When someone joins diginu using your link, they’re permanently connected to you in our system. From then on, every qualifying order they place on diginu can generate commission for you.

See also: How does the referral link work? · What does “linked for life” mean?
followups: How does the referral link work? (psp-003)
What does 'linked for life' mean? (psp-004)
Do referrals need my link every time? (psp-005)
aliases: how do i make money with diginu

items.question: How does the referral link work on diginu?
items.answer:
Your referral link is unique to you. Share it with people you want to enroll. When they join diginu through your link, our system saves that relationship automatically. They don’t need to enter your link again for future orders — the connection is already in place.

See also: How do I earn with diginuPSP? · Do referrals need to use my link every time?
followups: Do referrals need to use my link every time? (psp-005)
Are referrals linked for life? (psp-004)
aliases: where is my diginu referral link

items.question: What does “linked for life” mean on diginu?
items.answer:
“Linked for life” means that once a person joins diginu using your referral link, they remain permanently associated with you in the system. Whenever they place qualifying orders in the future, you can earn commission automatically — no extra action needed from either of you.

See also: How does the referral link work? · Can a user be moved to a different enroller?
followups: Can a user be moved to a different enroller? (psp-006)
Do referrals need to use my link every time? (psp-005)
aliases: what happens after they join with my link

items.question: Do referrals need to use my link every time they order?
items.answer:
No. Once someone has joined diginu using your referral link, they are already linked to you. They do not need to reuse your link for future orders — the system remembers you as their original enroller.

See also: How does the referral link work? · What does 'linked for life' mean?
followups: How does the referral link work? (psp-003)
Are referrals linked for life? (psp-004)
aliases: must they use my link again
do they need my link every time
do customers have to enter my link each time

items.question: Can a user be moved to a different enroller later?
items.answer:
Generally no. When someone joins using your referral link, they are permanently connected to you. In special cases where someone accidentally joined directly on the website or under the company, an enroller change may be requested within 7 days of joining by emailing enrollerchange@diginu.com with the original welcome email. Please verify the join date first.

See also: How do I request an enroller change?
followups: How do I request an enroller change? (enroller-change-policy)

items.question: What are the 2 ways to earn in diginuPSP?
items.answer:
diginuPSP (Profit Share Program) offers two earning opportunities:

  • Customer side: You earn commissions when customers join diginu using your referral link and place orders. These earnings are based on a 5-generation structure.
  • Merchant side: You can also earn when merchants onboard through your referrals and generate sales.

This section explains the customer (delivery) side only.

See also: How do I earn from customers? · What are PSP generations?
followups: How do I earn from customers on the delivery side? (psp-008)
What are generations in diginuPSP? (psp-009)
aliases: how to earn money with diginu

items.question: How do I earn from customers on the delivery side?
items.answer:
You earn by referring new customers to diginu through your unique referral link. When they join and place orders, you receive commission from the goods they purchase. These earnings are paid on up to five generations of referrals under you.

This applies to customer-side (delivery) PSP earnings only.

See also: What are PSP generations? · How does the 5-generation system work?
followups: What are generations in diginuPSP? (psp-009)
How does the 5-generation earning system work? (psp-010)
aliases: how to earn commissions on orders

items.question: What are generations in diginuPSP?
items.answer:
In diginuPSP, a generation refers to how far a referral is from you in the earning structure. When you enroll someone, that person is Generation 1. If they enroll someone, that new person becomes Generation 2, and so on — up to Generation 5.

This allows you to earn from the activity of people you introduced and those they introduce, creating a long-term income stream.

This structure applies to customer-side PSP earnings only.

See also: How does the 5-generation earning system work? · What percentage do I earn per generation?
followups: How does the 5-generation PSP earning system work? (psp-010)
What percentage commission do I earn per generation? (psp-011)

items.question: How does the 5-generation PSP earning system work?
items.answer:
With diginuPSP, you earn commission up to five generations deep from customers who joined using your referral link. When your direct referral orders, you earn from their purchase. You also earn smaller percentages from the orders of people they referred, up to five generations away.

This ensures that your network’s ongoing activity can create a recurring income stream over time.

These commissions apply to customer-side (delivery) PSP earnings only.

See also: What percentage commission do I earn per generation? · What part of the order qualifies for PSP earnings?
followups: What percentage commission do I earn per generation? (psp-011)
What part of a customer order qualifies for PSP commission? (psp-012)

items.question: What percentage commission do I earn per generation?
items.answer:
diginuPSP pays out a total of 1% commission on the goods purchased (excluding delivery, admin fees, and tips). This 1% is split across five generations as follows:

  • 0.5% on Generation 1
  • 0.2% on Generation 2
  • 0.15% on Generation 3
  • 0.10% on Generation 4
  • 0.05% on Generation 5

These rates apply to customer-side PSP commissions only.

See also: How does the 5-generation system work? · What part of the order qualifies for PSP earnings?
followups: How does the 5-generation system work? (psp-010)
What part of a customer order qualifies for PSP commission? (psp-012)

items.question: What part of a customer order qualifies for PSP commission?
items.answer:
PSP commission is calculated only on the total value of goods purchased by the customer. The following charges are excluded from commission calculations:

  • Delivery fees
  • Admin fees
  • Tips

This rule applies to customer-side PSP commissions only.

See also: What percentage commission do I earn per generation?
followups: What percentage commission do I earn per generation? (psp-011)
aliases: which part of order pays commission
do delivery fees count for psp
are tips included in psp commission

items.question: Where do I find my diginu referral link?
items.answer:
You can find your diginu referral link inside the diginu Food Delivery app:

  1. Open the diginu Food app and log in
  2. Tap on Profile
  3. Select Income Opportunity
  4. Tap Share my referral link

Your referral link is unique to you and is used to enroll new customers under you.

items.question: Does diginu offer monthly training?
items.answer:
Yes, diginu hosts monthly live training on the first Saturday of every month from 10:00 to 13:00 via Zoom Webinar. Training is presented by a panel of experts who cover practical topics to help you grow faster and succeed in the diginu opportunity.

✅ Training is completely free

To reserve your seat:

  1. Log in to your diginu account
  2. Go to My Academy
  3. Open Step 2
  4. Click Book to register
followups: Where do I find the online training on diginu? (training-002)
Does diginu offer certificates for training? (training-003)

items.question: What is the difference between diginu and network marketing or MLM?
items.answer:
diginu is not an MLM or network marketing company. Traditional MLMs usually require people to:

  • Buy starter packages to join
  • Make monthly product purchases to stay active
  • Pay annual renewal or membership fees

diginu is different. With diginu:

  • Signup is 100% free
  • No monthly purchases are required to qualify for commission
  • No renewal fees or joining kits

Think of diginu as a referral program on steroids. Instead of giving customers small discounts, we share real cash earnings when you refer people. We also split 1% of all turnover back into the community as referral commission, paid over 5 generations to allow teamwork and shared growth.
followups: Is diginu a pyramid scheme? (psp-015)
How do I earn with diginuPSP? (psp-002)
How does the 5-generation PSP earning system work? (psp-010)

items.question: Is diginu a pyramid scheme?
items.answer:
No — diginu is not a pyramid scheme. Pyramid and chain distribution schemes are illegal in South Africa under the Consumer Protection Act (CPA) No. 68 of 2008, Section 43. diginu fully complies with South African law.

Here’s why diginu is legal and legitimate:

  • We provide real products & services: diginu is a live delivery platform for food, groceries and essentials. Revenue comes from real customer orders — not recruitment fees.
  • No joining fees: It is 100% free to join diginu and earn from referrals. This complies with Section 43(2) of the CPA.
  • No compulsory purchases: You don’t need to buy products monthly or pay to qualify for earnings.
  • Commission is paid from real revenue: Earnings come from actual sales, not sign-up fees.
  • Referring is optional: Anyone can use diginu just as a customer, with no obligation to refer others.

diginu simply chooses to share marketing profit with its users through the diginuPSP (Profit Share Program), instead of paying big corporations for advertising. Think of it as a referral program on steroids — with jet fuel added 🚀.
followups: What is the difference between diginu and network marketing or MLM? (psp-014)
What is diginuPSP? (psp-001)
How do I earn with diginuPSP? (psp-002)

items.answer: diginu operates 100% remotely. If you have a smartphone or computer with internet access, you can work from anywhere. There are no office attendance requirements.

Your certificate will be issued automatically and can be downloaded and shared as proof of your achievement.

✅ Free training

items.question: Can I redo a training test if I fail?
items.answer: Yes, you can retry a training test if you don’t pass the first time. However, you only get 2 chances to pass each test in My Academy. After 2 failed attempts, you will not be allowed to try again for that course so make sure you study hard.

items.question: Who is my upline and where can I find their contact details?
items.answer:
You can find your upline inside your diginu account. Here’s how:

  1. Go to diginu.com and log in
  2. Click on Referrals in the menu
  3. Select the My Upline tab

There you will see the contact details of:

  • Your Direct Upline (the person who enrolled you)
  • Your Diamond Upline (senior support leader)

We recommend contacting both — they will be excited to support you and help you grow.

items.question: Is the word diginu a verb?
items.answer:
Yes, diginu is intended to be used as a verb. That’s why we always write it with a small “d” — it is becoming a household action word, like google, whatsapp or uber.

Example: “Let’s diginu dinner tonight.”

Always write it as diginu — never capitalised.
followups: What does the word diginu mean? (brand-002)

items.question: What does the word diginu mean?
items.answer:
The name diginu comes from combining two words:

  • digi – from digital
  • nu – from menu

So digi(tal) + (me)nu = diginu. It represents a digital menu and ordering platform designed for the modern world.
followups: Is the word diginu a verb? (brand-001)

items.question: How does diginu make money?
aliases: where does diginu income come from
items.answer: diginu makes money by adding a 15% service fee on top of the store's listed price, which is still about 5–15% cheaper than most other food delivery apps in South Africa. We also charge a fixed R8 admin fee per order and a R15 delivery fee.
followups: Why is diginu cheaper than other apps? (business-cheaper-than-others)
What fees does a customer pay on diginu? (customer-fees)
Does diginu charge merchants to join? (merchant-fees)

items.question: Why is diginu cheaper than other apps?
items.answer: diginu keeps prices lower by giving money to people instead of spending millions on marketing. Instead of paying for traditional advertising, we use the diginuPSP referral system to grow—this reduces costs and allows us to offer cheaper delivery rates to customers.
followups: How does diginu make money? (business-revenue-model)
What is diginuPSP? (psp-001)

items.question: What fees does a customer pay on diginu?
aliases: what do I pay on diginu
items.answer:
Customers pay:
- Menu price (includes 15% service fee)
- R15 delivery fee (if delivery is selected)
- R8 admin fee
- Optional tip for the driver
followups: How does diginu make money? (business-revenue-model)

items.question: Does diginu charge merchants to join?
aliases: do merchants pay to join diginu
items.answer: No, merchants do not pay any registration fees or monthly fees to join diginu—it is completely free. Merchants also receive their full menu price and can earn additional income from the diginu ecosystem.

items.question: How do I join as a merchant on diginu?
aliases: how to sign up as a merchant
how do I become a merchant on diginu
items.answer:
Joining diginu is easy:

  1. Visit our website and scroll down to “Join as a Merchant”
  2. Click “Join now” and complete the registration form
  3. Make sure you have access to your email to receive your OTP
  4. Submit — our team will review your application and set you up

After you apply, we’ll allocate a merchant marketer in your area as your dedicated contact person.

Do I get a dedicated merchant marketer to help me? (merchant-003)

items.question: Do I get a dedicated merchant marketer to help me?
